articles.author: Alex Ritman
articles.title: “We Love You Johnny!”: Depp Gets Rock Star Treatment in Saudi Arabia - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The actor was at the Red Sea Film Festival for a screening of 'Jeanne du Barry,' which was partly financed by Saudi Arabia.
articles.content: Johnny Depp underlined his growing relationship with Saudi Arabia on Friday by taking part in a Q&A at the country’s Red Sea Film Festival in Jeddah following a screening of his feature Jeanne du… [+1450 chars]
